text: Abo bantu bazoronka imirima y’ubuzima budahera, icamwo inzuzi z’amazi imbere yabo, muri iryo juru bazosharizwa n’imyambaro yo mumaboko y’inzahabu, hanyuma bambare impuzu z’urwatsi rubisi zihwahutse n’izindi ziremereye begamiye bari hejuru y’ubusaswa busharije neza, n’impembo nziza imeze gute ? Kandi n’ahantu heza hameze gute hukuruhukira
